summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 3, 2019, including count sheets, inmate rosters, and out-count forms. It records inmate counts, assignments, and movements, and notably includes Jeffrey Epstein on an attorney visit roster.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed on an inmate roster with assignment category 'ATTY' (attorney visit) and register number 76318-054, housed in unit Z04-206LAD.

events.title: Daily prison counts and inmate movements
events.description: Routine administrative counts and tracking of inmate locations, assignments, and out-counts (inmates away from their housing units) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, on August 3, 2019, with register number 76318-054.
Epstein is listed on an inmate roster with the assignment category 'ATTY', indicating he was scheduled for or had an attorney visit that day.
The documents show standard Bureau of Prisons administrative procedures for inmate counts, housing unit assignments, and tracking movements.
The total inmate census recorded across various housing units was 761 individuals.
Multiple forms (count sheets, rosters, out-count forms) were generated as part of the facility's daily operational routine.
